This is a codeblock test.

Accoring to markdown specification markdown is not processed within codeblock. Within a code block, ampersands (&) and angle brackets (< and >) are automatically converted into HTML entities. Nothing else is converted.

This is a test of markdown codeblocks
=====================================

Except & and < and > nothing is converted.
& is converted even if part of an entity &amp;
< is converted even if part of a tag <head>
This _word_ should not be emphasised.

This paragraph lays unders the codeblock.
